general.name: NetLogix - Test Conditional Disk Space
general.description:
Monitors disk space based on conditionals instead of static values. Allows you to exclude disks from monitoring via UDF.
Supported OS: Server 2012 and higher Related blog: https://www.cyberdrain.com/monitoring-with-powershell-conditional-disk-space-monitoring/
